user_query: show me database courses from  future learn platform not from other platform

debug_info.user_query: show me database courses from  future learn platform not from other platform

llm_generated_queries.thought_process: User asked for 'database courses' and specified the 'future learn' platform, while excluding courses from other platforms. Expanding the term 'database' to include related terms such as 'DBMS', 'SQL', and 'NoSQL' to capture more relevant courses.  Since platform specificity is given, only FutureLearn needs to be generated.

unified_data.description: Transact-SQL is an essential skill for data professionals and developers working with SQL databases.

unified_data.title: SQL for Data Analysis
unified_data.description: Move beyond basic data analytics and apply the working knowledge of SQL to query and transform a database.
learning_outcomes: Formulate complex SQL queries to analyze data.
Transform data using SQL functions and operators.
Apply SQL to perform data aggregation and summarization.
Filter and subset data based on specific criteria using SQL.
Design and implement basic database structures.

Extract data from SQL databases using Python scripts.
Develop T-SQL queries for data analysis and reporting.
Understand the fundamentals of the Transact-SQL language.
